item.description:
Boston Asian American Film Festival's hosting their launch party. You'll get to see sneak previews of their film festival lineup (Nov. 10-13) and win prizes.

You'll have a chance to win: ★ 2 VIP all access festival passes  ★ BAAFF classic t-shirt ★ BAAFF new t-shirt  ★
$25 Gift Card to Maggianos, Chili's, On the Border, or Romano's Macaroni Grill ★ WANG LEE HOM personal autographed poster.

$5 cover if you buy online before October 7. $10 at the door.

http://2011-baaff-launch-party.eventbrite.c...

group.name: The Greater Boston Asian Professionals Meetup Group

item.name: Party with Boston Asian American Film Festival
